import React from "react"; import "./Header.css"; import SearchIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Search"; import ShoppingCartOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCartOutlined"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useStateValue } from "./StateProvider"; function Header() { const [{ basket, user }, dispatch]= useStateValue(); return (
Hello {user ? 'Sign Out' : 'Sign In' }
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket.length}
); } export default Header;
